Some request tips...

Be relaxed and write like you’re speaking to a close friend. This will make it easier for your thoughts flow.

Details are key! The more information you share, the more tailored the solution will be.

Get focused. Think about what you want out of this coaching. Be mindful of your words.

What’s the deal? If you’re making this request for someone else, give us more details on why you’re doing so.
